author: Ron Rolston
review: Dreabon and her team has managed our investment property for several years now and we could not be more pleased with the property management services provided. We have used property management companies for many years now in several cities.

author: P A
review: Dreabon Robillard and her staff have managed our rentals for over a decade. Their communication is excellent, they are friendly and respectful to work with, and they perform regular inspections and handle maintenance needs as we have instructed. We work as a team and we really appreciate that.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for entrusting us with your properties. We enjoy working with you. Hearing about your positive experience brings us great joy, thank you for taking the time to share.

author: Christopher Panek
review: Windermere Property Management has been keeping an eye on our rental. The entire process from first contact to receiving our monthly statement/payment has been professional, very easy, and without worry. Two thumbs up.

author: Crista Engom
review: Easy to work with. The property is kept in excellent condition. We love our home.

author: Terri Garrett
review: We used Windemere as our property management for three years. They were difficult to get ahold of and used different 'associate' managers, so there was very little consistency. That would have earned them a three star rating. But when we

ownerResponse.text: I was able to pull up the account and see it was eight years ago. I did address this with you at the time and unfortunately we had to 'agree to disagree'. I still stand by the deposit refund that was issued but understand you still feel the  More

author: Elisha Volanos
review: Rented an apartment from them for a year and decided to move into a house after my lease was up. Never in my life have I ever had a rental company keep all of my deposit. Long story short, they fired the manager, ignored my calls and 4

ownerResponse.text: Elisha, are you sure youve left a review on the correct Windermere office? Our records do not show you as a tenant in 2018 and our staff consists of only 2 people; both of us with the company multiple years. I take client satisfaction very  More

author: Bev Martin
review: I sold my house June 2015 using Windermere Anacortes service's. Colleen Craig was my Realtor. I received amazing service from my Realtor and her associates in the office. I appreciated the excellent marketing of my home and the great follow

author: David
review: Paul Weisz is a great broker that knows what he's doing and is a very responsible person to work with!
